name: Fatman Simulator
description:
You fell in love with a lovely girl, and today you mustered up your courage to propose to her. Unfortunately, she refused–just like every other girl. It's definitely because you weight 100 kilograms! You decide to lose as much weight as possible in 3 months.

Fatman Simulator is a simulation indie game in which you can experience the life of a overweight programmer. In this game you can:
Work out at different place, such as lifting dumbbell at the gym, running on the running machine in your home or play basketball on the court.
Go on a diet while keeping a balance between your mood and your stamina.
discover special items with various effects.
Communicate with different people and complete their quests.
Improve your programming skill and earn more money.
Chase the girls you meet.

Try your best to lose weight and earn a better life!
